name: Miadria
description:
Miadria is company from Zagreb, Croatia. Covering Croatia, Serbia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Macedonia and Montenegro Miadria provides consultancy services for Google Apps as well as services related to Google Enterprise Search. Our clients use our technical deployment services as well as We can help you both with deployment and change management to make the experience as smooth and easy as possible.
Our service is oriented towards all companies that want to leverage power of Google innovation and reach new heights in productivity and efficiency while at the same time reducing cost.
